questions.question: What is ComfyUI_LLMVISION and what does it integrate into ComfyUI?
questions.answer: ComfyUI_LLMVISION integrates GPT-4 and Claude 3 models into ComfyUI, allowing for both image and text-based interactions within the ComfyUI workflow.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: What nodes are provided with ComfyUI_LLMVISION for image-based interactions?
questions.answer: The nodes provided for image-based interactions are GPT-4V Image Chat and Claude-3 Image Chat.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: How do I install ComfyUI_LLMVISION?
questions.answer: To install ComfyUI_LLMVISION, you need to clone the repository into the custom_nodes folder of comfyui and then install the required dependencies using pip install -r requirements.txt.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: What text-based chat functionality is available in ComfyUI_LLMVISION?
questions.answer: ComfyUI_LLMVISION provides text-based chat functionality via OpenAI Chat and Claude-3 Chat nodes.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: Can I customize prompts in ComfyUI_LLMVISION?
questions.answer: Yes, ComfyUI_LLMVISION allows for customizable prompts and model settings.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: How do I use the nodes in ComfyUI_LLMVISION in a workflow?
questions.answer: To use the nodes in ComfyUI_LLMVISION in a workflow, you need to locate the nodes in the node library under the AppleBotzz Category, drag and drop the desired node into your workflow, configure the node settings, connect the node to other nodes in your workflow as needed, and then run the workflow to execute the LLM-based tasks.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: What configuration options are available for each node in ComfyUI_LLMVISION?
questions.answer: Each node in ComfyUI_LLMVISION allows for configuration options such as openai_api_key, claude_api_key, endpoint, model, prompt, and max_token.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: Is there a warning about API keys in ComfyUI_LLMVISION?
questions.answer: Yes, the documentation warns that API keys will get saved in workflows and advises using environment variables to ensure no leakage.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: What is the relationship between ComfyUI_LLMVISION and the companies OpenAI and Anthropic?
questions.answer: ComfyUI_LLMVISION integrates models provided by OpenAI (GPT-4) and Anthropic (Claude-3) into the ComfyUI workflow.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'endpoint' configuration in ComfyUI_LLMVISION nodes?
questions.answer: The 'endpoint' configuration determines the API endpoint URL for the nodes, allowing users to either use the default OpenAI or Anthropic endpoints or specify a custom one.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_LLMVISION
